tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProteinLigandInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_id INT,
  ligand_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  affinity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ProteinLigandInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT NOT NULL,
    ligand_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Proteins (
 protein_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Ligands (
 ligand_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 smiles TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
 interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 protein_id UUID,
 ligand_id UUID,
 affinity FLOAT,
 FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES Proteins(protein_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (ligand_id) REFERENCES Ligands(ligand_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
 researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 affiliation VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  research_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ligands (
  ligand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ligand_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ligand_structure TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE proteins (
  protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  protein_sequence TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  ligand_id INT,
  protein_id INT,
  interaction_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  protein_id INT,
  ligand_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE
)
